law.catch_line: A State's Attorney shall prepare and submit to the Division of Parole and Probation and the Division...
law.text:
A State's Attorney shall prepare and submit to the Division of Parole and Probation and the Division of Correction a summary of the facts and evidence in each case tried in the circuit court for the county served by the State's Attorney in which:
the defendant was sentenced to imprisonment for 18 months or more; and
the Division of Parole and Probation did not prepare a presentence investigation report.
